text: Link's Crossbow Training is a shooter video game made by Nintendo for the Wii game console. It is a spin-off video game in The Legend of Zelda series. It uses the Wii Zapper, which is included with the game. ==References== Category:2007 video games Category:The Legend of Zelda spin-off games Category:Nintendo Entertainment Analysis and Development games Category:Video game spin-offs Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Wii games Category:Wii-only games Category:Wii Zapper games
title: Link's Crossbow Training
